name: Self-Service Graveyard
description:
A game about walking in a graveyard, reading, and finding peace. Press space to die and leave a note on your tombstone.

If you see other footsteps then someone else is playing at the same time! Others will also see your notes so please be kind <3

And yes this is a networked game, and the networking is done through hacking around Google Sheets. Turns out it's not too bad for prototyping (think of it as a free server + database).

If you're curious about how it works, here's a very poorly written guide I wrote, very much intended for myself though

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1793Pc2QUscgI4F5DM1T5kmNcpAIuLEOALsgUnsnvFnw/..

Music: "I Am a Man Who Will Fight for Your Honor" by Chris Zabriskie
